transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Vishal ji?
Customer: Ji sir, maine abhi just aapka screenshot hi dekha hai sir jo aapne mujhe bheja hai. 
Executive: Rukhiyega line pe.
Customer: Dekho ab same wohi aata hai message.
Customer: Matlab aapke waha pe aap ek baar dekh lo aapki side pe dekh lo kya filter kya kya kiya hai.
Executive: Ye application mein aapko aa raha hai na?
Customer: Ye application mein nahi aa raha hai naya product download karte hain usme aa raha hai.
Executive: Naya product add karte ho ye aa raha hai?
Customer: Haan jaise apna change kiya aap packing to uska jo design hota hai na usme ab below photo contain contact details to contact details to aayega hi aayega kuch bhi bolo aap.
Executive: Wo ek baar ye screenshot ko chodiye main bas aapse ye puchna chah raha tha jaise ki abhi aapne IndiaMART ki app open kari correct app open karne ke baad aap koi product new add kar rahe hain us time pe koi ek image add kar rahe hain waha par aapko ye issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Haan ye wo karne nahi de raha hai.
Customer: Ye atak jata hai photo rejected likha hai na special message hi likha hai dekho below photo contain contact details contact details to photo mein kahan pe aayegi ek hi jagah pe aayegi customer care number dusra to contact detail hota nahi hai.
Executive: Ek minute rukhiyega.
Customer: Mere ko ek cheez bataye isse pehle kabhi aise problem nahi aata tha abhi kyun aaya ye kuch to kuch aapke waha se gadbadi hui hai bhale bole nahi bole aap.
Executive: Nahi main ek baar cross check karwa leta hu.
Customer: Kuch to kuch aapne filter kiya hua hai aapke waha filter dekh lo aap ek baar kya filter kiya hai.
Executive: Main ek baar team se cross check karwa leta hu ki ye reject kyun ho raha hai sir. 
Customer: Theek hai aap aap dekh lijiye jitna ho sake utna kijiye mere piche aur bhi hai product ka.
Executive: Sir main samajh gaya hu par sir iske liye aap mujhe thoda time to allow karoge na sir.
Customer: Theek hai aap kam kijiye.
Executive: Mujhe na aage team se cross check karna padega kyunki mere pass abhi aapke liye koi answer nahi tha dene ke liye to mujhe pehle to main unko mail drop karunga uske baad main unka mail ka reply ka wait bhi karunga sir to please aap mujhe thoda support kariyega.
Customer: Aap dekh lo par ho jaye utna kijiye aap bas aur kuch nahi hai.
Executive: Sir main apni side se jitna effort ho sakta hai usse jyada hi lagaunga sir theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Ji. Theek hai dekhte hain aage.
Customer: Theek hai okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Facing issue while uploading new product image.

- Photo rejected due to contact details.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to cross-check with the team.

- Executive will drop a mail to the team.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will wait for the team's reply.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product upload, image rejection, contact details
